TOCHome / Terminology / ValueSet-carin-rtpbc-patient-pay-type-value-set

Defining URL:http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/ValueSet/rtpbc-patient-pay-type
Version:0.1.04
Name:CarinRtbpcPatientPayTypeValueSet
Definition:

This value set contains components of a patient's responsibility for a prescription product's cost.

Source Resource:XML / JSON / Turtle
  • CARIN RTPBC Response using ClaimResponse
This value set contains components of a patient's responsibility for a prescription product's cost."

Expansion

This value set contains 6 concepts

Expansion based on http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/CodeSystem/rtpbc-patient-pay-type version 0.1.04

All codes from system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/CodeSystem/rtpbc-patient-pay-type

CodeDisplayDefinition
deductibleDeductibleAmount to be collected from a patient to be applied to a periodic deductible.
coinsurancePer prescription coinsuranceAmount to be collected from a patient to satisfy a per prescription coinsurance.
copayCopayAmount to be collected from the patient to satisfy a per prescription copay.
taxTaxAmount to be collected from the patient for sales tax.
otherOtherOther amount to be collected from the patient
totalTotal patient responsibilityAmount equalling the total patient responsibility for a prescription product's cost.
